Georgia State Properties CommissionGeorgia's Real Estate Portfolio ManagerThe State Properties Commission is charged with acquiring and disposing all state-owned real property and providing lease assistance to state entities.Georgia Governor and Chairman Brian KempResourcesMulti-Year Lease ProcurementsProperty for Sale or LeaseAnnual Portfolio ReportsBuilding, Land & Lease Inventory of Property (BLLIP)An interactive web-based geographical information system. Check, search and prepare reports with real-time information about state-owned and -leased properties.Login to BLLIPPress ReleasesSPC FY2023 Portfolio ReportOctober 25, 2023SPC Leading Innovation at NASFASeptember 27, 2019The 29th Anniversary of the Signing of the Americans with Disabilities ActJuly 25, 2019
